tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hand_geometry_measurements (
    employee_id INT,
    hand_length FLOAT,
    hand_width FLOAT,
    clock_in_time TIMESTAMP,
    clock_out_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE employee_hand_geometry (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hand_length DECIMAL,
    hand_width DECIMAL,
    clock_in_time TIMESTAMP,
    clock_out_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE hand_geometry_measurements (
    hand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    hand_length DECIMAL(10,2),
    hand_width DECIMAL(10,2),
    measurement_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE hand_geometry_measurements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    hand_length DECIMAL,
    hand_width DECIMAL,
    clock_in_time TIMESTAMP,
    clock_out_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE hand_geometry_measurements (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hand_length FLOAT,
  hand_width FLOAT,
  thumb_length FLOAT,
  finger_length FLOAT
);
